TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler(object sender, SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs)
public delegate void SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件的來源，即 控制項。

span.span: The source of the event, the control.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示將處理 控制項之 、 和 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the , , and events of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件以執行任何前置處理步驟，例如新增參數至物件所包含的之前擷取輸出參數的值，資料庫動作會執行。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event to perform any preprocessing steps, such as adding a parameter to the object contained by the to capture the value of an output parameter, before a database action is performed. 在此範例中所執行的 insert控制項在傳統主版詳細資料案例中，使用預存程序。In this example an insert is performed by a control in a classic master-detail scenario, using a stored procedure. 輸出參數值，代表新插入的資料列的主索引鍵，會進行檢查時在作業完成之後，就會引發事件。The value of the output parameter, which represents the primary key of the newly inserted row, is examined when the event is raised after the operation completes. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理引發事件控制項，可能會取消所執行的資料庫動作與相關聯控制項控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event raised by the control, to possibly cancel a database action performed by a control associated with the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_6sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_6sql/CS/sql6cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_6sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_6sql/VB/sql6vb.aspx#1)]
